text: Hrm...it just occurred to me that Oketra’s Monument may have a place in an Edgar deck. You get human soldiers which can be relevant for things like Falkanrath Aristocrat, you get more tokens to feed or as chump blockers while you attack with your vamps, more general sac fodder. It works with Anointed Procession, etc. they don’t get counters from Edgar, but they sure do from Cathars’ Crusade. Just a thought experiment.
